comment_0: Rename this file or duplicate this file and call it config.json and then fill in all the values

DISCORD_BOT.comment_3: The status that you can see on the bot's profile

DEVELOPER.comment_4: This is the array of discord user ids that can use developer only commands
DEVELOPER.comment_5: This is the array of discord server ids that the developer only commands get registered to
DEVELOPER.comment_6: This is the webhook url that will be used for logging errors

API_KEYS.comment_8: Get your API key from https://www.weatherapi.com/
